title: Mao's Last Dancer

replies.body: He hides he's love fro dancing because he doesn't want to be shame apon from the league of legends community, he's actually Billy elliot in a tree costume.

oh pls no, if ur gonna do this, then pls do it on a chick who actually looks like they want to dance:
Akali (weapons = ribbons, so Ribbon Dancer Akali)
Lux (I dont need to explain what her weapon will look like)
JUST BECAUSE MAOKAI DOESNT LOOK THE PART DEOSNT MEAN HE CANT DANCE, LET HIM BE FREE FROM FIGHTING TO JUST DANCE!!!
Donger emoji confirmed. Why do you disgrace the donger name with your filthy so called maokai.
Maokai is the last dancer or the last dancer of Maokai?
moakai himself is the dancer ( i know i screwed up and forget the 'the' in the title)
